ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime.classes

Class QuestionSorter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime.classes.QuestionSorter

  • public class QuestionSorter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to sort an Question List by various fields, it is primarily used for the Sort function on the app pages that allow for sorting.
    Author:
    Brandon Smolley

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Upon creation of the sorter a list is initialized

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getSortType()
      Returns the type of the sort currently being used
      java.util.ArrayList<Question> sortByDate()
      Sorts the question list provided by the date of the object
      java.util.ArrayList<Question> sortByLocation(Context context)
      Sorts the question list by location, prioritizing those close to the users current location
      java.util.ArrayList<Question> sortByPhoto()
      Sorts the list by whether or not they have photos
      java.util.ArrayList<Question> sortByVotes()
      Sorts the question list provided by the number of votes of the object
